question.title: Slow "Go to References" in VS Code with Java extension pack
question.body:
I'm developing a Java project in VS Code and have installed the extension pack for Java. When I right-click on a method name or field name and select "Go to References", it takes a very long time to display the results.

My environment:

  • VS Code
  • Extension Pack for Java
  • Java project

Has anyone else experienced this performance issue with the "Go to References" feature? Any suggestions on how to improve its speed or alternative approaches to find references quickly?

question_comments.body: Please provide enough code so others can better understand or reproduce the problem.
